# refCon2

for use by disk drivers, clients of IOATADevice only. IOATADevice and IOATAControllers shall not use this field in any manner.

## Declaration

```swift
void* refCon2;
```

## Overview



## Instance Variables

- **refCon**: for use by disk drivers, clients of IOATADevice only. IOATADevice and IOATAControllers shall not use this field in any manner.
